mapper.insert: insert into chatting(sendUser, receiveUser, text) values(#{userid}, #{to}, #{text})
mapper.select: SELECT c.idx, (select username from member where c.senduser = member.userid) as sendUser, (select username from member where c.receiveuser = member.userid) as receiveUser, c.text, TO_CHAR(c.sendtime, 'yyyy/MM/dd-AM hh:mm') AS sendTime, d.profile FROM chatting c JOIN condition d ON c.sendUser = d.userid WHERE (c.sendUser = #{userid} AND c.receiveUser = #{to}) OR (c.sendUser = #{to} AND c.receiveUser = #{userid}) order by c.sendtime
